name: Google Voice - Cleanup
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Removes the GVoice logo and empty inbox announcement. Centers the search bar. The style is intended to function independent of color styles. The screen shot shows this style in conjunction with style 22379. For matching login screen, check out style 22355 2009 11 15 - Really centered the search bar. 2009 12 29 - Updated url prefix.
